Title: BERNEY Swiss Petite WATCH PENDANT Blue Enamel Gold Rose
Description: BERNEY Swiss Petite WATCH PENDANT Blue Enamel Gold Rose Swedemom is proud to present this Gold Overlay PENDANT WATCH by Berney of Switzerland. One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces (movement AND case) are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee' de Joux in Switzerland. The round gold 18mm dial (face) is signed "Berney," and "Swiss Made." It has black Roman Numeral markers and a black hour and minute hand.  The 22mm Gold Overlay case features a gold foil rose on a blue enamel background.  This Brand New, Battery Operated watch is an Heirloom quality timepiece that is sure to be enjoyed for many years to come. Feel free to contact us for a combined invoice with the shipping discount applied. Swedemoms hours are 8am to 5pm PST Monday-Friday.We are closed on weekends and major holidays.

Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities. MacHub is changing community fund-raising by facilitating the sale of high-value contributions and passing proceeds on to nonprofits in the community. We thank our supporters and we welcome your ongoing support of our efforts!
